title: [Request] How to throw a boomerang straw : r/LearnUselessTalents - Reddit
body: take the straw between your thumb and your first finger, or your index finger, flick it to put spin on it. aim it upwards so that if you put enough spin on it it will actually return to you like a boomerang. the spin direction should be towards yourself. 186. Finstyle • 8 yr. ago • Edited 7 yr. ago.
